metadata.dc:author: Salmerón, J
Guirado, C R
metadata.dc:description: 45 patients who had received total laryngectomy for laryngeal neoplasia were reviewed with CT, using a study protocol for systematic evaluation as well as the identification of the principal sites of probable recurrence. The advantages of this technique, and some of the considerations which have to be taken into account to avoid error in diagnosis, are commented upon.
metadata.dc:title: Valoración mediante tomografía computarizada de una recidiva tras la laringectomía total.
[Computer tomography assessment of recurrence following total laryngectomy].
